title: Part A
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not indicate that amino acids are the monomers of which this enzyme is composed.
The response indicates that amino acids are the monomers of which this enzyme is composed.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not indicate that bromelain acts by enabling the hydrolysis of the protein/polypeptide/amino acid chain, breaking apart the peptide bonds holding the amino acids together OR that bromelain breaks the bond between amino acids by using water as a reactant.

The response indicates that bromelain acts by enabling the hydrolysis of the protein/polypeptide/amino acid chain, breaking apart the peptide bonds holding the amino acids together OR that bromelain breaks the bond between amino acids by using water as a reactant.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response indicates that the activity of bromelain will increase or stay the same.
The response indicates that the activity of bromelain will decrease.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
